APP_DESCRIPTION: Explore our wide selection of products.

CART.TITLE: Your Shopping Cart
CART.EMPTY_MESSAGE: Your cart is empty. Add some products!
CART.LOAD_ERROR: Could not load the cart. Please try again.
CART.REMOVE_ITEM_ERROR: Could not remove item from cart.
CART.CONFIRM_REMOVE_ITEM: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
CART.CONFIRM_CLEAR_CART: Are you sure you want to clear your entire cart?
CART.CHECKOUT_SUCCESS: Your purchase has been successfully completed!
CART.EMPTY_CART_CHECKOUT_ERROR: You cannot proceed to checkout with an empty cart.

ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Could not connect to the server. Check your connection.
ERRORS.ADD_TO_CART_FAILED: Could not add product to cart.
